author: Reuters Editorial
title: Philip Morris International Files Proxy Statement For Annual Meeting Of Shareholders
text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Philip Morris International Inc:
* PHILIP MORRIS INTERNATIONAL- ‍ON MARCH 29, CO FILED A PROXY STATEMENT FOR ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON WEDNESDAY, MAY 9 - SEC FILING​
* IT IS PROPOSED THAT 14 NOMINEES FOR DIRECTOR ARE ELECTED AT ANNUAL MEETING, INCLUDING A NEW NOMINEE​
* IN ORDER TO INCREASE SIZE OF BOARD FROM 13 TO 14 DIRECTORS, BOARD AMENDED ARTICLE II, SECTION 2 OF BY-LAWS EFFECTIVE MARCH 29 Source text for Eikon: ( reut.rs/2uzpRaO ) Further company coverage:
